member.name: T:monogame.AnimatedTexture
member.summary: A helper class for handling animated textures.

member.name: M:monogame.Game1.Initialize
member.summary: Allows the game to perform any initialization it needs to before starting to run. This is where it can query for any required services and load any non-graphic related content. Calling base.Initialize will enumerate through any components and initialize them as well.

member.name: M:monogame.Game1.LoadContent
member.summary: LoadContent will be called once per game and is the place to load all of your content.

member.name: M:monogame.Game1.UnloadContent
member.summary: UnloadContent will be called once per game and is the place to unload game-specific content.

member.name: M:monogame.Game1.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Allows the game to run logic such as updating the world, checking for collisions, gathering input, and playing audio.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.

member.name: M:monogame.Game1.Draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: This is called when the game should draw itself.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.

member.name: T:monogame.TouchCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the TouchCollection type.

member.name: M:monogame.TouchCollectionExtensions.AnyTouch(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Input.Touch.TouchCollection)
member.summary: Determines if there are any touches on the screen.
member.returns: True if there are any touches in the Pressed or Moved state, false otherwise
